# unifi_user (Resource)

Manages a UniFi user (client device record, DHCP reservation).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "unifi_user" "nas" {
  mac         = "00:11:22:33:44:55"
  name        = "Synology NAS"
  note        = "Main storage server"
  fixed_ip    = "192.168.1.10"
  use_fixedip = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mac` (String) The MAC address of the device.

### Optional

- `blocked` (Boolean) Whether the device is blocked.
- `fixed_ip` (String) The fixed IP address for the device.
- `name` (String) The name of the device.
- `network_id` (String) The ID of the network for the fixed IP address.
- `note` (String) A note for the device.
- `use_fixedip` (Boolean) Whether to use a fixed IP address for the device.
- `user_group_id` (String) The ID of the user group for the device.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the user record.
- `is_guest` (Boolean) Whether the device is a guest.
- `is_wired` (Boolean) Whether the device is wired.
- `noted` (Boolean) Whether the device has a note.
- `oui` (String) The Organizationally Unique Identifier of the device.
- `site_id` (String) The ID of the site.
